title: Focus Award font
content:
I’m trying to find the font used in the Focus Award posters.  
Thank you for your help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012141732im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/2046836171_423c0d5818_o_5214.jpg)

author: plojel
